name: nfsb4
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0
body: |- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))

stmt.origin: mpg(s2, wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))), wnf(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))
-| wi(wal(s2, wnf(s0, w0)), wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))
-| wi(wal(s2, wnf(s0, w0)), wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s2, wnf(s0, w0)), wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: A variable not free in a proposition remains so after substitution in that proposition with a distinct variable. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)
